mapper.insert: insert into symbol_submission_content_failure_record (id, entity_id, symbol_id, op_type, message, failure_reason, status, creator, create_time, modifier, modify_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{entityId}, #{symbolId}, #{opType}, #{message}, #{failureReason}, #{status}, #{creator}, now(), #{modifier}, now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE failure_reason =VALUES(failure_reason), status =VALUES(status), modify_time =VALUES(modify_time)
